newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: Malaysia CCM Bioscience opens at 7.6 rgt.
newsitem.headline: Malaysia CCM Bioscience opens at 7.6 rgt.

text.p: The shares of CCM Bioscience opened for trading on the Kuala Lumpur Stock Exchange (KLSE) at 7.60 ringgit against an offer price of 2.80 ringgit.
The pesticide, fungicide and other agrochemicals maker had offered 6.12 million existing shares for sale as part of its initial listing exercise.
After five minutes of trading, the share was trading at 8.40 ringgit.
The company has forecast a net profit of 8.47 million ringgit in the year to December 31, 1997, against 8.23 million ringgit reported last year.
Based on this forecast, the projected earnings per share works out to 24.9 cents against 24.2 previously.
At the current price of 8.55 ringgit, the share is trading at a price-earnings multiple of 34.33 against 11.2 at the offer price.
